subject: Investing
title: Crypto Taxation Basics
description: A micro-lesson that makes Crypto Taxation Basics usable.

hook.text: A trader made 200 swaps in a year and owed taxes on every single one. He didn't know until April.

buildup.text: In most countries, selling, swapping, or spending crypto triggers a taxable event based on capital gains.

discovery.text: Short-term gains (held under a year) are taxed as income. Long-term gains get a lower rate in many jurisdictions.

twist.text: Even swapping one crypto for another is taxableâ€”something stock investors never face when holding.

climax.text: Use crypto tax software to track cost basis across exchanges and wallets. Manual tracking is nearly impossible.

punchline.text: The tax office doesn't care if you forgot. Track every trade from day one.

quiz.question: Is swapping one cryptocurrency for another a taxable event?
options: No, only selling for cash is taxable
